settings.generation: The variable will be generated as follow:

customCss.desc: Custom CSS template to generate a style from folders. Please use the following variables:
customCss.title: Custom CSS

prefix.desc: Prefix for variable generation. This will allow Style Settings to works, but you can edit them also in a CSS snippets.
prefix.folderName: where folder name will be standardized (removing all points, space and set to lowercase).
prefix.title: Prefix

snippets.desc: Use a local css snippet file instead of inject the styles into the DOM.
snippets.title: CSS Snippets file

styleSettings.desc: Custom “Style settings” template to generate a style from folders. Please use the following variables:
styleSettings.title: Custom Style Settings

settings.warning: This will reset your Style Settings!
